Title: Relates to providing for the remote conduct of certain practices and procedures relating to board meetings
Summary: Provides for the remote conduct of certain practices and procedures relating to board meetings for the duration of the state disaster emergency declared by executive order two hundred two that began on March seventh, two thousand twenty, or until December thirty-first, two thousand twenty-one, whichever is later.
LawCode: Amd §§708 & 602, BC L; amd §§603 & 605, N-PC L; amd §28, Rel Corp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the business corporation law, the not-for-profit corporation law, and the religious corporations law, in relation to providing for the remote conduct of certain practices and procedures relating to board meetings
